thread.section_title: Nutrisystem Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Nutrisystem | nutrisystem.com
thread.title: Cindy M

author: Cindy M
title: Cindy M
text:
I have done Nutrisystem before and lost a great deal of weight. Unfortunately I put it back on when I got married and had my children.
I have tried WW and other diets but found that if I have too many choices
and need to measure all my food I have trouble sticking to the diet. With
Nutrisystem everything is all measured and prepared for you. The food
is tasty and the snacks are great. Having the snacks satisfies my sweet
tooth. Thus far the program has been great.
